background_description: The background consists of rough tree bark with visible cracks, crevices, and irregular textures. There are patches of lighter, almost white, and greenish-grey lichen or moss growing on the bark surface, contributing to a mottled appearance.
camouflage_type: Color blending / Pattern matching / Shape disruption
explanation: The spider exhibits excellent camouflage. Its body coloration, a mix of browns, tans, greys, and subtle greenish hues, perfectly matches the variegated tones of the tree bark and the lichen growing on it. The mottled patterns on its abdomen and legs mimic the irregular textures and cracks of the bark, effectively breaking up its outline. The hairy texture of its legs further enhances the blending with the rough bark surface. Overall, the combination of color blending, pattern matching, and subtle shape disruption makes the spider incredibly difficult to distinguish from its environment.
